Metadata.Title: THE KILLER BRONY 3: SWEET APPLE MASSACRE
Metadata.Description: Hi, 47, same client and same targets; people who killed Applejack in their MLP Infection AUs.But it will be no easy, the client requested a nasty method to kill the targets, and also the use of a peculiar disguise, clearly inspired by a famous "creepypasta" who at the same time, it's inspired by a terrifying secret russian experiment performed in 1947.So many hatred just for innocent people who made fanfics of a child show...But anyways, are you ready to hunt the "guilty" ones, 47?
